headline: 2024 Workout Stations and Movements
text:
This is reference post containing the 2024 Workout Stations and Movements.

My feeling is that 2024 is where the games became and adult. This was my first time participating. 

The 2024 details are NOT current available on the REDLINE Fitness Games at time of writing. So I am providing her for reference purposes.

If you have any questions, requests or need any explanations, please stick it in the feedback form. and I'll do my best to address.

Thanks,

Steve
